phrases: Wow, who is that?
His face is so pretty.
Is that a girl?
No, you moron.
He is in a guy's uniform.
I have never seen him around here before.
He does not go to our school, does he?
That is not our uniform.
Unless, he is a...
A transfer student?
There is a new transfer student today?
Well, so I heard.
But it seems a bit too sudden to me.
Apparently the teachers just never told us about it.
And I hear it is a guy.
Not only that, but people are saying he is a real pretty boy!
Talk about stealing the spotlight!
Okay, everyone, I know it is a bit sudden, but we have a new student joining us today.
Come on in, Tsugumi-san.
Okay.
Pleased to make your acquaintance, everyone.
I am Tsugumi Seishirou.
I look forward to my time here.
Oh my gosh!
He is so hot!
He is like a model!
What a cute little face!
Just pick an open seat.
Okay.
Huh?
Did he just snicker at me?
Tsugumi?
Mistress!
It is been so long, Mistress!
H-Hey wait!
What are you doing?!
Are you crazy?
Everybody's watching!
Oh, Mistress!
I have waited so long for this moment.
Episode 7: Rival
Episode 7: Rival
Episode 7: Rival
I apologize for my abrupt appearance.
Claude-sama has ordered that I guard you while broadening my own knowledge.
Fair enough, but...
That aside, what is with your uniform?
Oh, this?
As much as I tried, I was unable to acquire a uniform for this school.
This was all I had.
Honestly though, I wonder why he is dressed like that?
Did not you hear him?
He could not get the right uniform.
Oh, that is not what I meant.
Oh, I see!
So that is how it is!
Well, of course he could not!
Oh well!
What is with you?
You are creeping me out.
By the way...
I have heard that you picked up quite a handsome boyfriend for yourself.
I must request that you introduce me to him, if you would.
Uh, right, yeah.
H-Hey, you over here!
This guy!
He is my new boyfriend!
Uh, nice to meet you.
I have heard so much about you!
But to see you in person now, I can be certain that you truly are as reliable as they say.
It is clear now that the Bee Hive gang is in good hands.
Thanks.
What is this?
I imagined a gangster like him would be nothing but bad news.
But he seems to be a pretty friendly guy.
Excuse me.
Allow me introduce myself more personally.
I am Tsugumi Seishirou.
Since Mistress and I are so close in age,
we often played with each other as children, essentially growing up together.
Lately though, we have not had any opportunity to see each other.
Thus, I have been worrying about her quite frequently.
What?
This gorilla woman?
Gorilla?
No, no.
He is just joking around!
Wait a minute, she told me she is never had any friends or boyfriends,
but there is one right here.
He counts, right?
Okay, open wide and say, Ah!
That is enough!
I told you, you do not need to feed me!
Oh, there is no harm in it, Mistress!
I remember when we used to eat like this all the time.
But we were just kids back then!
What am I watching?
You cannot keep acting like this, Tsugumi!
How long are you going to keep it up?!
Here!
It is your favorite, Assam tea!
Huh?
Oh, thank you.
Hey, enough already!
Mistress, you have grown up to be more magnificent than ever before.
What is with this guy?
Oh hey, doing all right there, Ichijou-kun?
That is a nice-looking rival you have got over there.
Ugh, you need to cut it out!
Stop being so clingy!
What?
Do not you think that is a bit harsh, Mistress?
And to think there was a time when we would even bathe together!
Okay, that is it!
I am going to the bathroom for a minute!
Do not you dare follow me!
Take your time.
Ichijou-san.
Would you mind if we spoke in private for a moment?
Why do we have to talk on the roof?
Well, there is one thing that I would like you to clear up for me.
It concerns our Mistress.
Do you truly love her with all your heart?
Damn straight I do!
That was close!
I almost denied it.
Is that so?
How much do you love her?
Well, I love her more than words can describe, of course!
Is that true?
Yeah, you bet!
Would you go so far as to give your life for my Mistress?
Of course!
I would give my life in a heartbeat!
Ah, I see.
That puts my mind at ease.
In that case, would you die for her right now?
Wait, no!
Hold on a...
Ouch!
Wh-What have I gotten myself into?
How disappointing.
I heard that Mistress had fallen for you,
but meeting you in person makes it clear that your attention span is that of a flea.
You are far too slow, and even completely defenseless.
How could you expect to protect Mistress?
You have made it clear.
I was right to think that you have deceived Mistress,
and that she is bound by spurious love!
Spit it out!
What is your goal here?
You want our turf?
Or do you plan to take over our whole organization?
Th-This guy...
I take back everything!
This guy's more bad news than I thought!
It makes no sense.
Why would Mistress fall for someone like you?
Even if she would been deceived,
there is not a single thing she would find attractive in you!
You are spineless!
Insignificant!
And seriously, there is no way you could ever love her more than I do!
Wait, what is he going on about now?
Oh, it does not matter now.
For a worthless gnat like you,
I need not concern myself with whatever schemes you may have.
I will do this fair and square.
I will release my Mistress from your evil grasp.
We will see soon enough...
which of us is more suited to remain by Mistress's side!
Yeah, that is exactly what I want.
It is not as though I enjoy being with her anyway.
Wait, no.
Actually...
Losing her'd be a disaster!
Kirisaki and I would both have hell to pay if that happened.
So you were fooling her, you punk!
This means war!
Hey, do not you run off yet!
You have got some nerve talking to me like that.
You want to know which one of us she belongs with?
The two of us are truly in love!
I would never let anyone take her from me!
Wh-What is happening out there?
No, wait.
I sort of see what is going on.
Damn it!
I just said something incredibly embarrassing without thinking!
In love, you say?
You think you are the one she belongs with, do you?
Hey!
Would the two of you stop this nonsense!
Come on guys, what kind of silliness is this?
Tsugumi!
Darling!
You two have to get along, okay?
Mistress, please stay out of our way.
With all due respect, Mistress, I cannot...
accept that this man is your partner!
Mistress, do you remember?
The promise we made ten years ago?
Promise?
Ten years ago?
After that day, I decided to become stronger
in order to be able to protect you with my own hands.
All these years, I have been subjecting myself to a rigorous training regimen,
honing my skills to become more powerful for your sake!
I pushed myself until I she would blood!
But all for what?!
Why is the man who is meant to be protecting you
such a spineless, flimsy, pathetic bean sprout?
I cannot allow this!
My Mistress is the heiress to the magnificent Bee Hive organization!
If you think that you have what it takes to protect her,
you will need to prove it before I will acknowledge you!
Ichijou Raku!
We will battle for Mistress!
I challenge you to a duel!
When you prove you have what it takes to defeat me, then I will acknowledge you as worthy of her.
However, if it is I who defeats you,
I will show you horrors worse than hell, and then...
I will kill you!
No, no, hold on a moment!
Can we just talk this over?
He is right, Tsugumi.
You need to chill out a bit.
After school, on the schoolyard.
Be there, or I will come kill you.
Wh-What now?
Oh, for Pete's sake!
I was hoping things would not turn out like this!
Wait, you knew Tsugumi was going to do this?
Of course I knew!
Was not it obvious?
I bet it was Claude who set all this up.
Tsugumi was adopted by Claude as a child...
and was put through specialized training and placed into elite classes for prodigies,
all to become a top-class hitman.
Hitman?
You know, a few years ago some thugs tried to hit on me,
and Tsugumi tore them and their whole organization to shreds!
That is how talented this kid is!
Singlehandedly, of course.
The whole organization, you say?
I-I never heard anything about this!
Is not there some way explain the situation, so that Tsugumi'll back off?
That is not happening.
Once Tsugumi gets going, it is too late.
What do you suggest we do then?
This whole city will go to hell if I lose.
That is not my fault!
You are the one who went and pissed Tsugumi off!
You reap what you sow!
You really are a moron!
That guy, though...
He wanted to protect Kirisaki,
so he stuck with his training to become stronger.
For ten years, even.
And it is not as though Kirisaki dislikes him.
Maybe deep down inside, Kirisaki wants him to win.
You would better not lose.
I-It is not like I care about what happens to you or anything, though.
But it will probably be a disaster for everyone if this does not work out.
There is a lot at stake here, so I will not forgive you if you mess this up.
Wow, you are so not cute...
at all, you know?
Sorry, what did you just say?
Uh, nothing.
Man, I guess I have to do this.
Might as well muster up some fighting spirit, I guess.
I commend you for actually showing your face.
Well, you know, this is my chance to show my honey how courageous I can be!
But that aside, can I ask you something first?
Oh my gosh!
Tsugumi-kun!
Where did this crowd come from?
I had nothing to do with this.
All right everybody, place your bets!
One meal ticket per wager!
We are running out of time!
I will put three on Tsugumi-kun!
I am throwing down ten!
Our duel begins the moment this coin hits the ground.
Prepare yourself.
It is too late to back down now.
This is the first fistfight I have ever been in, but still...
I will give it my best shot
As if I will even get to use my fists!
Hey, are those real?
No way!
What an idiot!
He expected Tsugumi to fight unarmed!
Do not lose, bean sprout.
Why are you running?
Face me like a man!
I am going to die!
I am really going to die!
I do not stand a chance in a fight like this!
Where is your manhood?!
As I suspected, there is no way you could ever protect Mistress!
Only I can protect her!
Get over yourself!
All you do is go on about protecting her!
Are not you the one who does not know a thing about her?
What did you say?
She is not at all the type to just sit and watch while someone else protects her!
You are the one lacking in manhood!
You call yourself a man?
Then you should be there to watch over her!
How dare you question my manhood!
I will kill you!
That is all you are mad about?!
God damn you!
I hate you more every time you speak!
How dare you...
Damn it, I cannot get anywhere with him!
I will just have to take my chances!
You will never escape me!
No way...
Time to cool off a bit!
They just jumped into the pool from the third floor!
Are they okay?!
Let us go check!
Yeah!
I cannot believe that actually worked.
That was so scary!
I thought I was about to die!
This is hopeless.
He is out like a light.
But now what am I supposed to do?
When he wakes up, it will be the same thing all over again.
But first things first.
I am going to catch a cold if I do not get changed soon.
Jeez.
I would feel bad just leaving him out if he caught a cold.
What a drag.
Why do I have to undress another dude?
Whoa!
You villain!
What do you think you are doing?!
Hey now, I was just...
A-A girl?
But he wears a guy's uniform!
And his name is Seishirou!
Hey, Raku!
Crap!
There is people!
This cannot end well.
If people see you like this...
Here, quick!
Clothes!
Your clothes!
Stay away from me, you fiend!
Darling?
Huh?
I could have sworn I heard people in here.
Where could he have gone?
We have looked everywhere in here now, have not we?
What do you think you are doing?
Hey, I had no choice,
not with everyone just outside.
Yes, I understand that,
but why do I have to be stuck here with you?
I am sorry!
I am seriously sorry!
Kirisaki-san!
There is no one in the girls' locker room, either!
But why did you want us to check in there, anyway?
Why else?
Because Tsugumi's a girl, of course.
What?!
What?!
So you really are a girl?
You thought I was a boy too?
I have never understood why, but people have continuously mistook me for a boy my entire life.
For goodness sake, I just do not get it.
Now, hold up!
You wear a guy's uniform!
Why?!
It is easier to move around in, why else?
If I wore something as frilly as that girls' uniform,
it would hinder my reaction time.
Well I am sorry, but if I would known you were a girl, this would never have happened.
Just forget about it.
I would not want Mistress to see me in such a shameful condition anyway.
I am pathetic.
I cannot believe I lost to the likes of you.
Why did I think that I could protect Mistress?
How will I ever show my face to Mistress again, after being reduced to such a state?
Wow, this girl...
Talk about a 180-degree turn!
Wait, she is a girl.
This situation could be pretty dangerous!
It is so dark in here, and we are so close that I can hear her breathing.
It feels like something soft is pressing against my body too.
Wow, if I really look, her curves are actually pretty feminine!
It is getting me all flustered now!
I need to calm down!
I know!
I will just think about Onodera.
Onodera, Onodera, Onodera, Onodera, Onodera, Onodera, Onodera, Onodera, Ono...
No, Raku!
Hey wait, your name...
Seishirou.
Is that an alias?
How rude!
It is my real name!
I was abandoned at birth, you see.
The man who adopted me gave me that name.
Somehow, he thought that I was a boy.
Consulting a name dictionary, he picked one completely at random for me.
Seishirou!
That Four Eyes...
Furthermore, as unbelievable as it sounds,
Why are you being so shy?
Are you a moron!?
even after raising me for ten years, he still does not realize that I am a girl.
Ten years?
Not that it makes a difference to me.
In order to fulfill my mission to protect Mistress,
I have long since given up on being a girl.
Is that so?
Yes.
I gave up on being a girl,
and became strong enough to confidently face any man.
But I guess I was wrong.
If I cannot protect Mistress, then what am I good for?
Well, you know, that is a shame, because you are actually pretty cute.
What?
Do not be ridiculous!
How can you say that I am cute?
No one's ever said that to me...
until today.
Mistress...
What in God's name do you think you are doing, you pig insect?
That makes sense.
So that is what happened.
You also thought that Tsugumi was a boy, huh?
So,
how did your duel turn out?
Uh...
Understand this, Ichijou Raku!
I have not lost to you just yet, you got that?
Huh?
You still have not proved that you have what it takes to protect my Mistress,
and that was the whole point of the duel!
So that outcome's invalid!
I will worry about how to deal with you later,
but if I determine that you are not good enough for her, you will be staring down a barrel again!
So keep that in mind and give her your best!
Is that right?
Whatever you say.
Hey, Raku!
Kyouko-chan said you have to put in a letter of apology,
for using the pool without permission.
Sorry, honey, I will be back in a minute.
Sure thing.
To be honest, he completely defeated me.
He said something to me.
He said that you are not the type to just sit and watch while somebody else protected you.
He said that?
Even with everybody worrying about you,
you have always been able to take care of yourself.
You also were always the kid who would come home with a big smile covered in dirt.
Trusting in you as I watch over you...
That is a different type of strength, is not it?
But you know, I still wonder why everyone seems to mistake me for a guy.
I wonder that myself.
I know!
Uh, hey, Mistress...
What was the point of this again?
Why are you making me wear this?
Wow!
I knew that would look good on you!
You look so adorable, Tsugumi!
I-I am most certainly not cute!
There you go again.
You are a girl, Tsugumi, so you got to dress like one!
I have no need for that.
I am only here to protect you,
and to fulfill the promise we made together!
Sorry, Tsugumi!
Remind me what that promise was about?
No matter how hard I tried, I could not remember it at all.
Ah, I thought you might have forgotten about it.
I do not blame you.
It was the day that we met, became friends,
and bathed together for the first time.
I said...
One day, I will become the kind of person who can protect you, Mistress!
Oh, good luck!
Th-That is even more off-hand than I imagined!
Seriously?
You have been living for a promise like that this whole time?
That was a very important moment for me, you know?
Well, to be honest, I am relieved.
But can you blame me for not remembering?
I mean, it is amazing that you could remember something from that long ago.
Mistress, you
Oh, that reminds me.
Tsugumi, this is for you.
With this, nobody could mistake you for a boy, right?
M-Mistress, I am truly grateful for your kindness,
but something this feminine could never suit me.
Huh?
Hey, what is with the ribbon?
Looks great on you!
It is cute.
I know, right?
No it is not!
Come to think of it, Mistress just now...
Do not tell me, the promise she made ten years ago with her first love...
Has she forgotten that as well?
